questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT
-

You plan to use Dynamics 365 Connected Field Service.

For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
1) Yes. Dynamics 365 Connected Field Service relies on Microsoft Azure to enable the connection of IoT devices
2)Yes. In Dynamics 365 Connected Field Service, you can configure rules to determine when an IoT error message triggers an alert
3) No. IoT alerts in Dynamics 365 Connected Field Service can be set to trigger automatic actions based on the severity or conditions defined in the rules.

questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP
-

A company plans to use several Dynamics 365 apps for business operations.

The company plans to use Microsoft Power Platform services to meet several business requirements.

Match each requirement to the Power Platform service.

Instructions: To answer, drag the appropriate Power Platform service from the column on the left to the requirement on the right. Each Power Platform service may be used once, more than once, or not at all.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
The last question is terribly written. If it is the customer entering information, then Power Pages is the best option (comes with multi step form functionality)

However, if it is internal, you can use a Business Process Flow to complete this, which falls under Power Automate.

Saying this, as it specifies 'Form' I would tend towards Power Pages
Capture information by a multi-step form is business process form. Business process forms fall under the power automate feature.

Capture information by multi-step form: Power Pages
Power Pages is a feature of Power Apps, allowing for the creation of multi-step forms and external-facing websites where users can input data.
Provided answer are correct, also in exam 01/22/2024

questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT
-

A company uses Dynamics 365 Customer Insights.

Select the answer that correctly completes the sentence.

//IMG//

A company uses lead scoring models with Dynamics 365 Customer Insights - Journeys.

You need to identify actions that affect lead scores.

Which two actions should you identify? Each correct answer is a complete solution.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

discussion.content: Customer profiles in Dynamics 365 Customer Insights are central to unifying and merging demographic data from various sources into a single, unified view of the customer

Select the answer that correctly completes the sentence.
